title: Research
text:
I work in ecology, evolution, and plant conservation, mainly in the Mediterranean area.
I am affiliated with AMAP, a plant ecology and botany lab.
I collaborate extensively at the research/conservation interface, including CBN, PN, CEN.

title: Teaching
text:
I am staff at the University of Montpellier, Faculty of Sciences, Department of Biology & Ecology.
I teach ecology, botany, and data analysis.
Within the Master “Biodiversity and Environmental Management”, I co-lead the RAINET track.
